title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date() as value in table filter.
OB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") as a filter in a table, an error message is displayed on the report page.
EB: The filter should work without errors and there should be no error messages on the report page.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and add a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the value1 field of the filter, input 'new Date("...")', e.g. 'new Date("3/2/2005")'.
